content:
The Minister of Defense of Ukraine Rustem Umerov thanked Finnie's Defense Minister Antta Hakukiann for joining the Czech initiative for the purchase of ammunition for Ukraine.

About this head of the defense departmentWritingThe Twitter Twitter.

“I am grateful to Finland's Defense Minister, Antta Hakikanen, for an important decision to join the Czech initiative to supply artillery ammunition to Ukraine by sacrificing 30 million euros for this case. Thank you for the unshakable support! ” - says in the post.

As reported by the Armyinform, FinlandprovidesEUR 30 million to Ukraine for the purchase of shells within the framework of the Czech initiative.
title: Armed Forces projectiles: Rustem Umerov thanked Finland for joining the initiative
description: He wrote about it on Twitter. “I am grateful to the Minister of Defense ...
author: Army Inform
